S03n243:1: abhūtaguṇasaṃbhāvanā pratodasaṃcodaneva bhavati sādhūnāmiti guṇasaṃpādane prayatitavyam |
S03n243:3: bodhisattvaḥ kila śrutakulavinayamahānakṣudranipuṇamatiraviṣamavyavahāraratiranekaśāstrābhyāsādālakṣitavacanasauṣṭhabaḥ karuṇānuvṛttyā samantato visyandamānadhanasamṛddhirmahāpradānairmahādhanatvād gṛhapatiratnasaṃmato'nyatamasya rājñaḥ śreṣṭhī babhūva |
S03n243:6: atha kadācittasminmahāsattve rājakulamabhigate kenacideva karaṇīyena tasya śvaśrūrduhitaramavalokayituṃ tadgṛhamabhijagāma |
S03n243:7: kṛtābhyāgamanasatkārā ca saṃkathāprastāvāgataṃ svāṃ duhitaraṃ bodhisattvabhāryāṃ rahasi kuśalaparipraśnapūrvakaṃ paryapṛcchatkaccittvāṃ tāta bhartā nāvamanyate |
S03n243:12: atha sā tasyā mātā jaropahataśrutismṛtitvāllajjāsaṃkucitākṣaraṃ tanayayā tadvacanamabhidhīyamānaṃ na samyagupadhārayāmāta |
S03n243:14: sā sasvaramabhiruditā svāṃ duhitaramanuśocantī duḥkhāvegavaśātparidevanaparā babhūva |
S03n243:15: kīdṛśastasya śīlaguṇasamudācāro ya evamanuraktaṃ svaṃ janamapahāya pravrajitaḥ ?
S03n243:18: kṣitipābhimatasya tasya vai vanavāse praṇatā matiḥ katham ||2 ||
S03n243:20: kathamekapade rujaṃ vinā vibhavodgāri gṛhaṃ sa muktavān ||3 ||
S03n243:24: śuciśīladhanaḥ kimāpnuyānna sa geheṣu vane yadīpsati ||5 ||
S03n243:28: na ghṛṇāpathameti mānasaṃ yadi vā dharmalavo'pi sidhyati ||7 ||
S03n243:29: atha sā bodhisattvasya patnī tena mātuḥ karuṇenākṛtakena paridevitena patipravrajyābhisaṃbandhena strīsvabhāvād vyathitahṛdayā sasaṃbhramā viṣādaviklavamukhī śokaduḥkhābhinipātasaṃkṣobhādvismṛtakathāprastāvasaṃbandhā pravrajito me bharteti madvyavasthāpanārthamambā gṛhamidamabhigatā vipriyaśravaṇāditi niścayamupetya saparidevitaṃ sasvaraṃ rudatī mohamupajagāma bālā |
S03n243:31: tacchrutvā prātiveśyamitrasvajanabandhuvargaḥ saṃśritajano brāhmaṇagṛhapatayaśca tasya gṛhapateranurāgavaśānugāḥ prāyaśaśca paurāstadgṛhamabhijagmuḥ |
S03n243:34: atha bodhisattvo rājakulāt svabhavanasamīpamupagataḥ sākrandaśabdaṃ svabhavanamavetya mahataśca janakāyasya saṃnipātaṃ svaṃ puruṣamanvādideśa jñāyatāṃ kimetaditi |
S03n243:38: atha sa mahāsattvaḥ prakṛtyā śuddhāśayaḥ pratyādiṣṭa iva tena vacasā samupajātavrīḍasaṃvegaścintāmāpede |
S03n243:41: gṛhābhimukha eva syāṃ yadi kiṃ mama pauruṣam ||10 ||
S03n243:42: syāddoṣabhaktiḥ prathitā mayaivaṃ guṇeṣvavajñāvirasā ca vṛttiḥ |
S03n243:43: yāyāmataḥ sādhujane laghutvaṃ ki jīvitaṃ syācca tathāvidhasya ||11 ||
S03n243:46: iti vicintya sa mahātmā tata eva pratinivṛtya rājñaḥ pratihārayāmāsa-śreṣṭhī punardraṣṭumicchati devamiti |
S03n243:51: mayi sthite bandhusuhṛdviśiṣṭe tvaṃ kena duḥkhena vanaṃ prayāsi |
S03n243:52: yannāpahartuṃ prabhutā mama syāddhanena nītyā balasaṃpadā vā ||13 ||
S03n243:57: iti sa mahātmā sasnehabahumānamabhihito rājñā sānunayamenamuvāca-
S03n243:59: ato na duḥkhena vanaṃ prayāmi yamarthamuddiśya tu taṃ nibodha ||15 ||
S03n243:65: na hi bhavadvidhānāṃ janapravādasaṃpādanābhirādhyā guṇavibhūtistadasaṃpādanavirādhyā vā |
S03n243:67: kurvīta yastā hṛdaye'pi tāvatsyātso'pahāsyaḥ kimuta prapattā ||17 ||
S03n243:72: tasyā na hīyeta naraḥ sadharmā hriyāpi tāvaddhuramudvahettām ||18 ||
S03n243:73: saṃbhāvanāyāṃ guṇabhāvanāyāṃ saṃdṛśyamāno hi yathā tathā vā |
S03n243:74: viśeṣato bhāti yaśaḥprasiddhyā syāttvanyathā śuṣka ivodapānaḥ ||19 ||
S03n243:76: vicūrṇitā kīrtitanurnarāṇāṃ duḥkhena śaknoti punaḥ prasartum ||20 ||
S03n243:78: krodhocchiraskāniva kṛṣṇasarpānyukto'si māṃ deva na saṃniṣeddhum ||21 ||
S03n243:79: snehena bhaktijñatayā ca kāmaṃ yukto vidhirbhṛtyajane tavāyam |
S03n243:80: vittena tu pravrajitasya kiṃ me parigrahakleśaparigraheṇa ||22 ||
S03n243:81: ityanunīya sa mahātmā taṃ rājānaṃ kṛtābhyanujñastena tata eva vanāya pratasthe |
S03n243:82: athainaṃ suhṛdo jñātayaḥ saṃśritāścābhigamya śokāśrupariplutanayanāḥ pādayoḥ saṃpariṣvajya nivārayitumīṣuḥ |
S03n243:87: gṛhāśrama eva puṇyatama ityevamanye śrutiyuktisaṃgrathitaṃ grāhayitumīhāṃ cakrire |
S03n243:88: tapovanavāsaduḥkhatāsaṃkīrtanaiḥ kāryaśeṣaparisamāptyā yācñayā paralokaphalasaṃdehakathābhistaistaiśca vārttāviśeṣairnivartayitumenaṃ vyāyacchanta |
S03n243:89: tasya tān pravrajyāśrayavimukhān vanagamananivāraṇadhīramukhān nayanajalārdramukhān suhṛdo'bhivīkṣya vyaktamiti cintā babhūva-
S03n243:90: suhṛtpratijñaiḥ suhṛdi pramatte nyāyyaṃ hitaṃ rūkṣamapi prayoktum |
S03n243:91: rūḍhaḥ satāmeṣa hi dharmamārgaḥ prāgeva rūcyaṃ ca hitaṃ ca yatsyāt ||23 ||
S03n243:92: vanād gṛhaṃ śreya idaṃ tvamīṣāṃ svastheṣu citteṣu kathaṃ nu ruḍham |
S03n243:94: mṛto mariṣyannapi vā manuṣyaścyutaśca dharmāditi roditavyam |
S03n243:95: kayā nu buddhyā vanavāsakāmaṃ māmeva jīvantamamī rudanti ||25 ||
S03n243:96: madviprayogastvatha śokaheturmayā samaṃ kiṃ na vane vasanti |
S03n243:97: gehāni cetkāntatarāṇi mattaḥ ko nvādaro bāṣpaparivyayena ||26 ||
S03n243:98: atha tvidānīṃ svajanānurāgaḥ karoti naiṣāṃ tapase'bhyanujñām |
S03n243:102: nivāraṇārthāni sagadgadāni vākyāni sāśrūṇi ca locanāni |
S03n243:103: praṇāmalolāni śirāṃsi caiṣāṃ mānaṃ samānasya yathā karoti ||29 ||
S03n243:108: ye me haranti sma puraḥsaratvaṃ raṇeṣu mattadvipasaṃkaṭeṣu |
S03n243:109: nānuvrajantyadya vanāya te māṃ kiṃsvitsa evāsmi ta eva ceme ||32 ||
S03n243:110: smarāmi naiṣāṃ viguṇaṃ prayātuṃ snehasya yatsaṃkṣayakāraṇaṃ syāt |
S03n243:112: mamaiva vā nirguṃṇabhāva eṣa nānuvrajantyadya vanāya yanmām |
S03n243:113: guṇāvabaddhāni hi mānasāni kasyāsti viśleṣayituṃ prabhutvam ||34 ||
S03n243:114: ye vā prakāśānapi gehadoṣānguṇānna paśyanti tapovane vā |
S03n243:116: paratra caiveha ca duḥkhahetūnkāmānvihātuṃ na samutsahante |
S03n243:117: tapovanaṃ tadviparītamete tyajanti māṃ cādya dhigastu moham ||36 ||
S03n243:118: yairvipralabdhāḥ suhṛdo mamaite na yānti śāntiṃ nikhilāśca lokāḥ |
S03n243:120: iti sa parigaṇayya niścitātmā praṇayamayāni suhṛdviceṣṭitāni |
S03n243:122: tadevamabhūtaguṇasaṃbhāvanā pratodasaṃcodaneva bhavati sādhūnāmiti guṇasaṃpādane prayatitavyam |
S03n243:123: yato bhikṣurityupāsaka iti guṇataḥ saṃbhāvyamānena sādhunā tadbhāvasādhubhirguṇairabhyalaṃkartavya evātmā |
